channel.title: Create a game
channel.description:
[center][b]Make a Computer Game.[/b][/center]
First of all, You should go to www.Gamemaker.nl.
It will direct you to the download ETC, Click Download.
Then wait for it to download, It will give you dircetions on how to do stuff.
Lin (MoparScape CM) Showed me this :)

item.title: Create a game
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

Ya. GameMaker is English, and it’s really easy to understand. There are built in variables in the coding, and it very similar to Java (In a way…)… Come to think of it, it’s related to a lot of game languages. But you don’t have to use code.

Read full topic

item.title: Create a game
item.dc:creator: @fellixombc fellixombc
item.description:
@fellixombc wrote:

game maker, yes, i like it, though i dont really like since it cant be turned into a .fla or .wmv or etc…
but, anyone got a serial for this?

Read full topic

item.title: Create a game
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“God of Ikiliki, post:4, topic:106228”][quote author=© CopyRight © link=topic=152122.msg1435605#msg1435605 date=1181037643]
[center]Make a Computer Game.[/center]

First of all, You should go to www.Gamemaker.nl.

It will direct you to the download ETC, Click Download.

Then wait for it to download, It will give you dircetions on how to do stuff.

Lin (MoparScape CM) Showed me this
[/quote]
Wow,
Why you even link english people to a dutch site lol,
.nl is dutch, lucky I can speak it,

Also gamemaker in dutch is for idiots, they show massive credits to theirself lol[/quote]

It’s actually an English site. Don’t presume these things.

Read full topic

item.title: Create a game
item.dc:creator: @bootnecklad bootnecklad
item.description:
@bootnecklad wrote:

[quote=“Doc. Booty, post:2, topic:106228”]No

My Guide is better, tbh.
[hr]
[center]Make a Computer Game.[/center]

First of all, You should go to http://docs.java.com

It will give you some basic techinuqes for creating a java game.

Have patients and you have created your first game!.

World (Owner of > *) Showed me this :)[/quote]

0W D0 1 LIEK MK3 53RVE3R!!11!!!1!1!1!!!1!111!!!1 ONE ONE ONE !!! ONE!!!1111!!1!!!111111

on the other hand Teach me it sounds fun PM plox!!!
